changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.EXTERNAL_VENDOR ev WHERE ev.AVAILABILITY_TYPE_ID='OWN') BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.EXTERNAL_VENDOR (COUNTRY, SAG_ARTICLE_GROUP, BRAND_ID, VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_PRIORITY, DELIVERY_PROFILE_ID, AVAILABILITY_TYPE_ID, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_USER_ID, MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES(N'cz', NULL, NULL, 0, N'Own Sag', 0, 0, N'OWN', NULL, getDate(), 0, NULL) END
